code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import useGetUser from"../../hooks/UserHooks/useGetUser";import styleFavCards from"./FavoritCards.module.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FavoritCards=()=>{const[cards,setCards]=useState([]);const{userInformation}=useGetUser();useEffect(()=>{const fetchCards=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('https://monkfish-app-z9uza.ondigitalocean.app/bcard2/cards');if(userInformation){const favoriteCards=response.data.filter(card=>card.likes.includes(userInformation._id));setCards(favoriteCards);}}catch(error){console.error(error);}};fetchCards();},[userInformation]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bodyCards",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styleFavCards.container_cards,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:styleFavCards.stickTitle,children:"Favorite Cards"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styleFavCards.frontCard,children:cards.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No favorite cards found."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:styleFavCards.listOfCards,children:cards.map(card=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:styleFavCards.item,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:styleFavCards.imgCards,src:card.image.url,alt:card.image.alt}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:card.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:styleFavCards.p,children:card.subtitle}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:styleFavCards.p,children:card.address.country})]},card._id))})})]})});};export default FavoritCards;
